name: The Return Home: Alien's Edition
description:
Story 

Agent Blue an FBI agent, woke up in laboratory in the middle of a strange futuristic alien world, she was kidnapped among other agents by the aliens to be studied and morphed into aliens to be recruited in future top-secret missions to take over invade the entire Galaxy as they just discover its existent. In an attempt to execute a mad experiment that was never tested before, all agents were morphed into aliens.

 However, Agent Blue was the only human that did not fully turn into an alien, but on the other hand, she has the chance to morph into an alien for a short amount of time when she drinks a mystery potion that was made by mad alien scientists. These mystery potions are hidden in different areas and Agent Blue is on the hunt for these mystery potions to fool and outsmart the aliens while she finds out her way back home.

 On her way to run away from this laboratory to the unknown open world, she remembers glimpses of what she witnessed before the failed experiment, how an alien took 4 quarters that were the keys that turn on the spaceship they came in. She determines to go on a risky hunt to collect these keys and find the hidden spaceship.

Controls

Move:  WASD

Transform : Mouse Right Click
